class_1.label: Unburned/Unchanged
class_1.description: Areas with no detectable fire impact from satellite imagery

class_2.label: Low Severity
class_2.description: Areas with minor vegetation changes, ground char limited to surface litter

class_3.label: Moderate Severity
class_3.description: Areas with significant vegetation damage, shrub layer consumed, partial canopy loss

class_4.label: High Severity
class_4.description: Areas with complete vegetation consumption, deep ground char, stand replacement

validation_guidelines.temporal_window: Within 1 year post-fire for best accuracy

metadata.notes: Standard MTBS thresholds for Pacific Northwest forests
